verses.verse: Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

<S%H1571>"Previously<s%><S%H865>,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us, you were the one who <S%H3318>led<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out and in. And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'You will <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you will be a <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> then they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> [and] he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

At <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> thirty-three <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Now the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You shall not <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H2008>here,<s%> but the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and <S%H6455>lame<s%> shall <S%H5493>turn<s%> you <S%H5493>away<s%>"; <S%H559>thinking,<s%> <S%H1732>"David<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H2008>here.<s%>"
Nevertheless, <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> that is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3605>"Whoever<s%> would <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> let him <S%H5060>reach<s%> the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> who are <S%H8130>hated<s%> by David's <S%H5315>soul,<s%> through the <S%H6794>water<s%> <S%H6794>tunnel.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> "The <S%H5787>blind<s%> or the <S%H6455>lame<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4686>stronghold,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> from the <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>became<s%> <S%H1980>greater<s%> and <S%H1419>greater,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was with him.

Then <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> <S%H6086><s%> and <S%H2796>stonemasons<s%><S%H68>;<s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>realized<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him as <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that He had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for the <S%H5668>sake<s%> of His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Meanwhile <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those <S%H3209>who<s%> were <S%H3209>born<s%> to him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>
<S%H2984>Ibhar,<s%> <S%H474>Elishua,<s%> <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> <S%H3309>Japhia,<s%>
<S%H476>Elishama,<s%> <S%H450>Eliada<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphelet.<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H1245>seek<s%> out <S%H1732>David;<s%> and when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it,] he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4686>stronghold.<s%>
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves out in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Shall I <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? Wilt Thou <S%H5414>give<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>?" And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H5927>"Go<s%> up, for I will <S%H5414>certainly<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to Baal-perazim, and <S%H5221>defeated<s%> them <S%H8033>there;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> <S%H6555>through<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me like the <S%H6556>breakthrough<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> Baal-perazim.
And they <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> their <S%H6091>idols<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> so <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> them away.
Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H3254>once<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves out in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> [directly] up; <S%H5437>circle<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them and <S%H935>come<s%> at them in <S%H4136>front<s%> of the <S%H1057>balsam<s%> <S%H1057>trees.<s%>

"And it shall be, when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>marching<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H1057>balsam<s%> <S%H1057>trees,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> you shall <S%H2782>act<s%> <S%H2782>promptly,<s%> for <S%H227>then<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will have <S%H3318>gone<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1507>Gezer.<s%>
